page.title: 16Uppermill 3
page.content: Uppermill has always been a centre for{outdoor pursuits,}but recently it has begun to attract a great many {visitors}to the village itself.The tourist area of Uppermill is very attractive and compact, centred on the recently renovated{canal}(part of the Huddersfield Canal) along which a barge runs givingtrips at peak times. There is also a{museum}with a collection of working textile machinery and a{craft centre}where craftsmen can be seen at work. The village also has many attractive {shops,pubs and restaurants}and a weekly market. The new{Brownhill Visitor Centre,}on the banks of the canal points out the natural history and other attractions of the area and also stages exhibitions of local interest
